trans-unit.source: Returns data from a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached"></xref> event.
`RecognizerUpdateReached` events provide a mechanism for pausing a speech recognition engine to apply atomic and synchronous modifications, such as loading and unloading grammars.
trans-unit.target: `RecognizerUpdateReached`事件提供用于暂停语音识别引擎将原子和同步修改，例如加载和卸载语法的机制。

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>实例能够识别，它可以使用其中一个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来请求引擎暂停以接收更新。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>实例引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>事件当准备好更新。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>实例已暂停，你可以加载、 卸载、 启用和禁用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象，并修改值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>实例能够识别，它可以使用其中一个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来请求引擎暂停以接收更新。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>实例引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>事件当准备好更新。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>实例已暂停，你可以加载、 卸载、 启用和禁用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: When handling <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> events, a recognition engine pauses until the event handler returns.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>事件，将识别引擎暂停，直到事件处理程序返回。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取与事件关联的音频位置。

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the location indicated by AudioPosition to access audio input that occurred while the recognition engine was paused.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用 AudioPosition 所指示的位置访问已暂停识别引擎时发生的音频输入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location within the speech buffer of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> when it pauses and raises a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event.
trans-unit.target: 返回中的语音缓冲区的位置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref>或<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>时它暂停，并引发`RecognizerUpdateReached`事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the `UserToken` passed to the system when an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate*> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取`UserToken`传递到系统，当应用程序调用<> *1> 或<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: An application specifies a `UserToken` when it requests the generation of a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event by calling one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods that take a `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序指定`UserToken`当它请求的生成`RecognizerUpdateReached`通过调用其中一个事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法采用`userToken`参数。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that contains the `UserToken`.
